GPUTextureView.summary: The GPUTextureView interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents a view into a subset of the texture resources defined by a particular .

remarks.para: A GPUTextureView object instance is created using the method.

GPUTextureViewLabel.summary:
The label property of the
interface provides a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUTextureView object.

GPUTextureViewLabel.value: A string. If this has not been previously set as described above, it will be an empty string.
